timeline.bodyText: This sounds a bit wrong; what's the reasoning for changing it?
timeline.author: zentol
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -126,14 +126,14 @@ You can exclude a heading from the table of contents:

-This will be replaced by a default back to top link. It is recommended to use these links at least at the end of each level-2 section.
+This will be replaced by default back to top link. It is recommended to use these links at least at the end of each level-2 section.

replies.bodyText: The link mentioned here is not specific. Hence I think the article used can be removed when the context is more generic.
replies.author: PoojaChandak

timeline.bodyText: I'm not really convinced. It still sounds wrong, and it strikes be as odd to remove it here despite being present for labels. I will revert this change (actually adjust it slightly to remove default because I have no idea what that is supposed to mean).
